education.description: Final project, won in TOP 6, fault management app in the city (municipality solution), the goal of the project is to streamline the process of transferring information between citizens and city centers so that malfunctions will be handle as quickly as possible. The project includes attracting API from another platform using JSON files, saving data to a database, working with a local server, designing the site, using SQL, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

work.title: Junior full-stack developer
work.description: Implemented an internal dashboard application that is used to manage and analyze machines data. The application allows collecting data and executing commands on machines. (such as Ubuntu, Debian, etc.) For this project I've used jinja, PostgreSQL databases, React.js, Python,Rest-API, Kibana. During my work at G.S.R I developed strong skills in Python, bash, jinja, building docker container images, React.js, angular.js.
